page.title: 03Harbertonford School
page.content:
Harbertonford School is a Church of England primary school. The children who attend the school are aged between five and eleven.
All the children in the area come to this school. I live in Harbertonford so I can walk to school. The children who live in the surrounding villages are brought in by car or on a special bus.
The school is divided into four classes with about thirty children in each class. Each class has its own teacher and that teacher takes nearly all of the lessons for that class.
I am in Mr Peach's class. I am in the second year.
